lead_paragraph: A panel that advises the World Health Organization on pandemics will meet on Tuesday to decide whether to declare the H1N1 flu outbreak over.
snippet: A panel that advises the World Health Organization on pandemics will meet on Tuesday to decide whether to declare the H1N1 flu outbreak over.

headline.main: Panel Will Decide if Flu Outbreak Is Over
headline.print_headline: Panel Will Decide if Flu Outbreak Is Over
